body_html: @samuelBB I've successfully built TF 1.5 from source (branch r1.5, a week ago, before they release the 1.5 in the master branch) with CUDA 9.1 and cuDNN 7.0.5 on Ubuntu 16.04; can train a network and performs inference. Tested on Titan V, Titan Xp, and Titan X and had no problem.

body: @samuelBB I've successfully built TF 1.5 from source (branch r1.5, a week ago, before they release the 1.5 in the master branch) with CUDA 9.1 and cuDNN 7.0.5 on Ubuntu 16.04; can train a network and performs inference. Tested on Titan V, Titan Xp, and Titan X and had no problem.
